hook: Howay! Minute Magpie here — your one-minute Toon brief.
bullets: Squad note: Training looked sharp today — a couple of knocks being managed ahead of the weekend.
Tactics talk: Creators are eyeing width and quick switches as the way to stretch the next opponent.
Fan watch: Flags at the ready — plenty of noise expected in the Gallowgate!
signoff: Keep it friendly, keep it black-and-white — links below. Away the lads!
